program main
    implicit none
    integer, parameter :: M = 1000000007
    character(len=100000) :: s
    integer :: n
    integer(8), dimension(:,:), allocatable :: dp
    integer(8) :: position, nrstSeqStartIndx, startIndex, result
    integer(8) :: i, current_char_code

    ! Read input string
    read(*,'(a)') s
    n = len_trim(s)

    ! Allocate DP array
    allocate(dp(n+1, 2))
    dp = 0
    dp(1,1) = 1

    ! Process the first part do i = 1, n
        current_char = s(i:i)
        if (current_char == '0') then
            ! First part of the first if-else
            dp(i+1,1) = dp(i,1)
            dp(i+1,2) = dp(i,2)
        else
            dp(i+1,2) = mod( dp(i,1) + dp(i,2), M )
        end if

        ! Second part
        if (current_char == '0') then
            ! Add to dp(i+1,2)
            temp = mod( dp(i,2)*2, M )
            dp(i+1,2) = mod( dp(i+1,2) + temp, M )
        else
            temp0 = mod( dp(i,1)*2, M )
            temp1 = mod( dp(i,2)*2, M )
            dp(i+1,1) = mod( dp(i+1,1) + temp0, M )
            dp(i+1,2) = mod( dp(i+1,2) + temp1, M )
        end if
    end do

    position = mod( dp(n+1,1) + dp(n+1,2), M )

    ! Now process the second part
    nrstSeqStartIndx = 1_8
    do while (getValueAtIndex(nrstSeqStartIndx *2) < position)
        nrstSeqStartIndx = nrstSeqStartIndx *2
    end do

    do while (getValueAtIndex(nrstSeqStartIndx +1) < = position)
        nrstSeqStartIndx = nrstSeqStartIndx +1
    end do

    startIndex = 1 + (nrstSeqStartIndx -1)*nrstSeqStartIndx /2
    result = (position - startIndex) +1

    print *, result

contains
    integer(8) function getValueAtIndex(index)
        integer(8), intent(in) :: index
        getValueAtIndex = 1 + (index -1)*index
children.label: code_analysis

    end function
end program

program main
    implicit none
    integer, parameter :: M = 1000000007
    character(len=100000) :: s
    integer :: n
    integer(8), dimension(:,:), allocatable :: dp
    integer(8) :: position, nrstSeqStartIndx, startIndex, result

    n = len_trim(s)

    dp = 0
    dp(1,1) = 1

    ! Process the first part

        current_char = s(i:i)
        if (current_char == '0') then
            ! First part of the first if-else
            dp(i+1,1) = dp(i,1)
            dp(i+1,2) = dp(i,2)
        else
            dp(i+1,2) = mod( dp(i,1) + dp(i,2), M )
        end if

        ! Second part

            ! Add to dp(i+1,2)
            temp = mod( dp(i,2)*2, M )
            dp(i+1,2) = mod( dp(i+1,2) + temp, M )
        else
            temp0 = mod( dp(i,1)*2, M )
            temp1 = mod( dp(i,2)*2, M )
            dp(i+1,1) = mod( dp(i+1,1) + temp0, M )
            dp(i+1,2) = mod( dp(i+1,2) + temp1, M )
        end if
    end do

    position = mod( dp(n+1,1) + dp(n+1,2), M )

    ! Now process the second part
    nrstSeqStartIndx = 1_8
    do while (getValueAtIndex(nrstSeqStartIndx *2) < position)
        nrstSeqStartIndx = nrstSeqStartIndx *2
    end do

    do while (getValueAtIndex(nrstSeqStartIndx +1) <= position)
        nrstSeqStartIndx = nrstSeqStartIndx +1
    end do

    startIndex = 1 + (nrstSeqStartIndx -1)*nrstSeqStartIndx /2
    result = (position - startIndex) +1

    print *, result

contains
    integer(8) function getValueAtIndex(index)
        integer(8), intent(in) :: index
        getValueAtIndex = 1 + (index -1)*index /2
    end function
end program

program main
    implicit none
    integer, parameter :: M = 1000000007
    character(len=100000) :: s
    integer :: n
    integer(8), dimension(:,:), allocatable :: dp
    integer(8) :: position, nrstSeqStartIndx, startIndex, result
    integer(8) :: i, temp, temp0, temp1

    ! Read input string
    read(*,'(a)') s
    n = len_trim(s)

    ! Allocate DP array
    allocate(dp(n+1, 2))
    dp = 0
    dp(1,1) = 1

    ! Process the first part
    do i = 1, n
        if (s(i:i) == '0') then
            ! First part of the first if-else
            dp(i+1,1) = dp(i,1)
            dp(i+1,2) = dp(i,2)
        else
            dp(i+1,2) = mod( dp(i,1) + dp(i,2), M )
        end if

        ! Second part
        if (s(i:i) == '0') then
            temp = mod( dp(i,2)*2, M )
            dp(i+1,2) = mod( dp(i+1,2) + temp, M )
        else
            temp0 = mod( dp(i,1)*2, M )
            temp1 = mod( dp(i,2)*2, M )
            dp(i+1,1) = mod( dp(i+1,1) + temp0, M )
            dp(i+1,2) = mod( dp(i+1,2) + temp1, M )
        end if
    end do

    position = mod( dp(n+1,1) + dp(n+1,2), M )

    ! Now process the second part
    nrstSeqStartIndx = 1_8
    do while (getValueAtIndex(nrstSeqStartIndx *2) < position)
        nrstSeqStartIndx = nrstSeqStartIndx *2
    end do

    do while (getValueAtIndex(nrstSeqStartIndx +1) <= position)
        nrstSeqStartIndx = nrstSeqStartIndx +1
    end do

    startIndex = 1 + (nrstSeqStartIndx -1)*nrstSeqStartIndx /2
    result = (position - startIndex) +1

    print *, result

contains
    integer(8) function getValueAtIndex(index)
        integer(8), intent(in) :: index
        getValueAtIndex = 1 + (index -1)*index /2
    end function
end program
